casebody.data:
CURRITUCK ASSO.
v.
HOLLOWELL. No. 528A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 22, 2005. George R. Ragsdale, Walter L. Tippett, Jr., Raleigh, for Hollowell & Shallowbag Bay Dev.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of February 2005 by Appellee for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Seven day extension allowed. Appellee (Currituck Associates) shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of February 2005."
